page.title: 05Communications
page.content: The area is served by two local radio stations,namely,BBC Radio Merseyside and the independent station,Radio City,broadcasting on 202 and 194 metres medium wave,respectively.Radio City News is available at any time by simply phoning "194". The normal national television services are available in the area i.e. BBC1,BBC2,ITV and Channel 4. Welsh television stations can also be received because the area is so close to the North Wales Transmitters. The Fire,Police and Ambulance Services have their own communications systems (radio,computer,telephone and postal links) for maintaining contact both at local and national level. In our area over 50% of households have a telephone.The telephone services are part of the "051-" Merseyside area of British Telecom.
